message: Right now you support movies.yahoo.com/movie/* urls, but now they have an India specific in.movies.yahoo.com/video/* and in.movies.yahoo.com/movieplayer/*
Need video embeds for these too.
Also, does Yahoo! offer HTML5 video embeds generally?
Also Yahoo! Movies is showing incorrect thumbnails: http://embed.ly/docs/explore/oembed?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmovies.yahoo.com%2Fmovie%2F1810150710%2Ftrailer
Can you submit a ticket? It's hard for us to track requests via convore.
